message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth more than $80 to me. I am willing to sell it to you for $100. I believe this is a fair price considering the quality and value of the product.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to try to get a better deal. Can you meet me in the middle at $90?
